name: MetaverseCyberTime(MCT)
0:
”Alexa, open Metaverse Cyber Time”
”Alexa, ask Metaverse Cyber Time what the time is.”
”Alexa, ask Metaverse Cyber Time to tell me the time.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metaverse cyber time
des:
When coordinating efforts in the metaverse, it would be useful if we all referred to the same clock.
Metaverse Cyber Time (MCT) is that clock. As a separate timezone, it may be calculated as UTC-6 with no change for Daylight Savings.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
